title: How are the Kosmik series books for the JEE Advanced for maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: The problems in the book are good..but the issue is there solution is given just given below the question…you should not see solutions when you want to master maths…because maths is not a novel…you can't learn maths just by seeing the way problems are being solved…all you need to do is practice and practice…so look for book which has more unsolved problems… Best luck 👍
